main event: On April 19, 1967, observers reported a balloon-shaped object with lights hovering and moving rapidly near Wilmer, Alabama.
interesting points: The object was described as cone-shaped with a flat bottom,The observers saw the object approximately 333 feet above the road,There was no sound associated with the object's movement,Animals in a nearby pasture exhibited signs of disturbance while the object was visible,No known aircraft traffic was present in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Mrs. Robison and Mr. Robison observed the object from their home, corroborated by a third individual, Mr. Pierce.
